ground_truth_bugs.description: Duplicate downsize method definition causes ArgumentError for 4-arg callers
Hardcoded 10MB client-side limit ignores site settings, causing client/server divergence
Passing 80% to gifsicle --resize-fit fails for animated GIFs (expects WxH geometry)

droid_missed_descriptions: Hardcoded 10MB client-side limit ignores site settings
notes: Droid caught 2 of 3 bugs with 100% precision. Droid comment about the downsize call signature (ID 2699755513) correctly identifies an issue but attributes it to the wrong cause - it mentions ArgumentError from method signature, but the actual problem is gifsicle's --resize-fit not accepting percentage syntax. The golden comment for the same bug is more accurate about the root cause. Droid missed the client-side hardcoded limit issue which is a valid configuration/UX bug.
